column1: Table 15. Percentage of cotton acreage receiving nitrogen fertilizer, selected States
NA = Not available. Source data cover selected States in selected years; NA reflects State/crop/nutrient instances with no coverage.
1/  U.S. average is average of State's percents of acres receiving fertilizer, weighted by State's planted acres receiving fertilizer.
Source: Taylor (1964-93), NASS' Agricultural Chemical Usage (1994-2010):  http://www.nass.usda.gov/Surveys/Guide_to_NASS_Surveys/Chemical_Use/
